summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Weed and Seed Program; authorizing execution of agreements with the United State Department of Justice and the United States Department of Justice, Federal Bureau of Investigation; accepting the money when received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budgets of the Police Department, Health Department, Department of Parks and Recreation, and Department of Housing and Human Services for the continuation of Weed and Seed Programs; and making an appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourts vote of the City Council.
